title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: NEAR Gains 4.4% as Index Rises from Wednesday
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Ripple (XRP) was also among the top performers, gaining 4%.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 2966.55, up 1.0% (+29.05) since 4 p.m. ET on Wednesday.

Ten of 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: NEAR (+4.4%) and XRP (+4.0%).

Laggards: ADA (-5.6%) and APT (-5.1%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 index rose 1.0% with ten of twenty assets trading higher, led by NEAR (+4.4%) and XRP (+4.0%).
